page.title: 06THE VILLAGE SHOP
page.content: The shop is a {general store,}owned by {Andrew's parents.}It is the only shop in our village. It sells things like fruit, vegetables, tinned food, sweets and crisps. It is also a{newsagents and tabacco is sold.{Video films }can be hired. The shop sells other things like shampoo, soap, deodorant, washing powder and fabric conditioners. It sells{drinks,}both soft and alcoholic. {Cooked meat}like corned beef and ham can be bought.{Pet foods}for cats, dogs, rabbits and hamsters are on sale too. Hay and sawdust can also be bought. {Frozen foods}are sold too. There is a{newspaper round}but not everybody has their papers delivered; some collect them from the shop. There is a{Post Office}counter but this is quite small. There is about Â£1,000 worth of stamps in the Post Office every day.
